product.name: Trading card packaging
product.description: Identifies how trading cards are packaged, such as blister pack or booster pack

product.name: Card attributes
product.description: Describes special features of collectible trading cards, like foil or holographic

product.name: Rarity
product.description: Specifies the uniqueness of items, typically for collectibles; e.g. limited edition, ultra rare

product.name: Product rating count
product.description: Total number of ratings from customers

product.name: Color
product.description: Defines the primary color or pattern, such as blue or striped

product.name: Theme
product.description: Describes the product's primary theme or motif, such as sport, space, or holidays

product.name: Recommended age group
product.description: Identifies the suitable age range for a product, typically toys and games; e.g. babies, teens

product.name: Toy/Game material
product.description: Identifies the main material used in a toy or game, such as plastic or wood

product.name: Condition
product.description: Describes the state or quality of a product, e.g. mint (M), poor (P)
